name: First Donation
description: Awarded for receiving the first donation face-to-face.

name: Neighborhood Star
description: Get recognized by a local news outlet for your fundraising efforts.

name: Event Organizer
description: Organize a successful face-to-face fundraising event.

name: Community Builder
description: Recruit 20 new supporters through face-to-face interactions.

name: Quick Starter
description: Get 5 face-to-face donations within the first week.

name: Global Outreach
description: Receive face-to-face donations from 5 different nationalities.

name: Monthly Goal Achiever
description: Achieve monthly face-to-face fundraising goal 3 times in a row.

name: Inspiring Leader
description: Lead a team to raise $5000 in a month through face-to-face fundraising.

name: Public Speaker
description: Give 5 presentations about the fundraising cause.

name: Face-to-Face Pro
description: Reach 100 face-to-face interactions in a single campaign.
